src:
MU Hidupkan Minat untuk Andre Onana
05 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah informasi terungkap mengenai manuver transfer Manchester United. TIm berjuluk Setan Merah itu diberitakan kembali berminat untuk merekrut Andre Onana dari Ajax Amsterdam.
Pada musim panas kemarin, United sempat berburu kiper baru. Mereka mulai mencari sosok yang bisa menggantikan David De Gea, setelah sang kiper enggan meneken kontrak baru di musim panas kemarin.
Namun beberapa waktu yang lalu, De Gea resmi memperbaharui kontranya di Old Trafford. Alhasil rumor perburuan United terhadap kiper baru kembali mereda.
Namun De Telegraaf mengklaim bahwa United ternyata masih meminati kiper Ajax itu. Mereka disebut kembali mencoba untuk membawa sang kiper ke Old Trafford.

Mengapa MU ingin membeli Onana? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
MU Turns on Interests for Andre Onana
05 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An information was revealed about Manchester United's transfer maneuver. The team nicknamed the Red Devils was reported to be interested in recruiting Andre Onana from Ajax Amsterdam.
Last summer, United had a chance to hunt for a new goalkeeper. They began to look for someone who could replace David De Gea, after the goalkeeper was reluctant to sign a new contract last summer.
But some time ago, De Gea officially renewed the counter at Old Trafford. As a result rumors of the hunt for United against the new goalkeeper again subsided.
But De Telegraaf claims that United are apparently still interested in the Ajax goalkeeper. They called back trying to bring the keeper to Old Trafford.

Why did MU want to buy Onana? Check out the information below.
